title: Riverdale
brief_description: Set in the present, the series offers a bold, subversive take on Archie, Betty, Veronica and their friends, exploring the surreality of small-town life, the darkness and weirdness bubbling beneath Riverdale’s wholesome facade.

constellations_other.name: Power and privilege, monarchy and make-up
constellations_other.description: The upper echelons of society explored through colour, make-up and scandal.
